section.name: 3. EJB Facade
section.p: Demonstrates deploying Cayenne on JBoss server and accessing it via a SessionBean facade.

subsection.name: 1.1 Preparing the Environment
subsection.p: The example requres running JBoss server, version 3.0 or newer. Building the example requires Ant and XDoclet 1.1.2 installed.

subsection.name: 1.2 Building Example
subsection.p: After installing XDoclet and starting JBoss, follow generic instructions for building examples. Build script will deploy all application components to the JBoss server.

subsection.name: 1.3 Running Example
subsection.p: Web client can be accessed on the JBoss server via a URL like http://localhost:8080/ejbfacade-web/
